welcoming.about: <0>Ruang work was created as a place to share inspiration, tips, tricks, snippets, hobbies, something interesting in the scope of technology, entertainment, and so on. such as programming, design, AI, cryptocurrency, books, movies, to product reviews.</0><1> The purpose of this site is to be an informative, entertaining, and useful platform for readers by offering a variety of interesting content on technology, entertainment, and other related topics. Thus, it is hoped that this site can be a valuable resource for visitors in developing their knowledge, skills, and interests.<1>
